description: Indicates a change in T1 Loop Status.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? '(LOS) Unable to detect the DS1 signal' : (($v1 == 2) ? '(LOF) Unable to synchronize on the DS1 signal' : (($v1 == 4) ? '(RAI) The transmitting equipment has lost its incoming signal.' : (($v1 == 8) ? '(AIS) Transmission interruption located either at the equipment originating the AIS signal or upstream of that equipment' : 'Line placed in loopback from remote.')))

description: Indicates a change in Sw56k Loop Status.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'DSU is receiving Out of Service or Out of Frame code from network' : (($v1 == 2) ? 'DSU has detected sealing current from the central office but the receive level is below -45db' : (($v1 == 4) ? 'DSU does not detect sealing current on the loop interface' : (($v1 == 8) ? 'DSU cannot find the framing pattern' : (($v1 == 16) ? 'DSU is searching for the loop rate' : (($v1 == 32) ? 'Set when the DSU in telco initiated RT test' : (($v1 == 64) ? 'DSU in telco initiated LL test or when the transmit and receive pairs are reversed' : 'remote digital loopback initiated from remote DSU'))))))
